casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Eddie Lamar TAYLOR. No. 719A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 2, 2006. Anne M. Gomez, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Taylor. William Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Thomas H. Lock, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of May 2006 by Defendant for Extension of Time for Court Reporter to Prepare and Deliver Transcript:

"Motion Allowed. Court reporter shall have up to and including the 4th day of June 2006 to prepare and deliver transcript to counsel. By order of the Court in conference this the 2nd day of May 2006."
